definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Look, there is a bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 看，有個公共汽車停車站。

sentences.english: Our school is across from the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校在公汽停車站對面。

sentences.english: The road to success has many tempting parking places.
sentences.chinese: 在通往成功的路上有許多誘惑的停車站。

sentences.english: A bus came just as I got to the stop.
sentences.chinese: 我剛到停車站，一輛公共汽車就來了。

sentences.english: The city also built 40 two-tiered, weather-protected, bike parking structures.
sentences.chinese: 此外，廣州還修建了40座雙層封閉式自行車停車站。

sentences.english: The conductor won't let anybody off between stops.
sentences.chinese: 在兩個停車站之間，售票員是不會讓任何人下車的。

sentences.english: A bus cam. just as I got to the stop.
sentences.chinese: 我剛到停車站，一輛公共汽車就來了。
